name: Echo Night (itch)
description:
A father is separated from his daughter after a plane crash on an unknown island inhabited by mysterious entities.  The sun has set, the night surrounds you, and you are not welcomed here. Call her name and listen for her cries - before they get her.

Hit space bar to shoot an orb and wsad or arrows to move the player. If the orb hits Mary, then she will respond and shoot a light toward you. The threat meter increases with shooting orbs and decreases when around "safe places" which are campfires around the map. The monsters start to chase you once your threat meter increases.
